subject: Re: Assistance with creating cards on https://royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/
preview: Thank you so much Rica. That photo looks heaps better.  I just need to find a new image & upload it for one of the other ways to donate but I can do that myself.  Hope you have an enjoyable weekend.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Thank you so much Rica. That photo looks heaps better.

I just need to find a new image & upload it for one of the other ways to donate but I can do that myself.

Hope you have an enjoyable weekend.

MARTINA FOX​

Hi Martina,

Sure, we have made the update on the image. Let us know if you would like further changes.

@rica done for this image updates https://royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/

time: 5mins
@jaime can you please crop the picture and make it the same size as the other images on the pages. It's okay to cut off some people just make sure that the big cheque is on there. Thanks!

Thank you Rica for making the changes. It looks so much better.

Would you please crop this photo so that it is the same proportions as the other 4 photos and doesn't have the opaque background:



If you need to lose the chap on the far left that is OK.

Thank you Rica.

MARTINA FOX​

Hi Martina, 

Confirming we have now made the updates on and they are ready for you to review.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@rica done for this layout updates
please check here: https://royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/

let me know if you have any questions, thanks

time: 25mins

Thank you very much Rica for reformatting the cards.

Whilst you're under the hood would you please replace this image:



With this image I just uploaded to Media: https://royalrehab.com.au/wp-content/uploads/20200610_121741-scaled.jpg

Thank you very much Rica.

Kind regards

@jaime can you also please check on this one, thanks!

Hi


Thank you very much for fixing up the background colour of the logos yesterday - they're perfect 😊


Now for my next question, would you please advise me how I can convert the existing 5 flip cards on https://royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/ into non-flipping cards. If possible could they be changed to image boxes like these ones I started:



The above are not ideal as:

  • they require a button at the bottom of the first 4 image boxes
  • the 5th image box needs to be the same size as the other 4 image boxes.


Maybe you have a better layout you could suggest to illustrate our 5 ways of donating? The main request is we do not want them to flip like they currently do but remain static. Any ideas?


Thank you very much in advance for your assistance with reformatting these.


MARTINA FOX​
